training_description: We help you acquire the practical skills needed to enter the labor market with confidence through professional and comprehensive training programs.
service_2: Skills development courses for the labor market
about_app_description_en:
"Wazzifni" is a smart digital employment application that connects job seekers directly with companies and institutions in Iraq efficiently.
The app features a user-friendly interface allowing users to build professional profiles, upload CVs, and apply for available jobs in minutes.
It focuses on local labor market needs and integrates recruitment, smart notifications, and supportive career services.
about_developer_description_en:
The app is developed by Employment Gateway Company for Recruitment and Manpower Services LLC, a registered Iraqi company based in Najaf.
The company provides digital solutions in recruitment and employment, aiming to organize and modernize the local labor market through a reliable platform for employers and job seekers.
contact_address_value: Najaf – Al-Ghadeer District – Opposite the College of Administration and Economics
privacy_intro_text: Issued by: Employment Gateway Company for Recruitment and Manpower Services LLC
privacy_definitions_text:
Article 1 – Definitions:
1. "Company": Refers to Employment Gateway Company.
2. "App": Refers to the Wazzfni mobile application and its website.
3. "User": Any natural or legal person using the services, either as a job seeker or employer.
4. "Personal Data": Any information that identifies or can identify the user.
privacy_data_collection_text:
Article 2 – Scope of Data Collection:
The Company only collects the following data within the limits of legal compliance and service requirements:
• Full name, email address, phone number.
• Professional and CV data.
• Geolocation data (upon user approval).
• Usage data (IP address, device type, OS, usage timestamps).
privacy_data_usage_text:
Article 3 – Purpose of Data Use:
Collected data is used to:
1. Enable access and use of services.
2. Personalize and improve user experience.
3. Notify users of job opportunities and training programs.
4. Fulfill legal obligations.
privacy_data_sharing_text:
Article 4 – Data Sharing:
The Company does not sell or share data with third parties without explicit consent, except:
• Employers selected by the user.
• Legal or governmental authorities upon official request.
privacy_data_protection_text:
Article 5 – Data Protection:
The Company implements technical and administrative measures to safeguard user data from loss, breach, or unauthorized use, including secure encryption and SSL protocols.
privacy_user_rights_text:
Article 6 – User Rights:
Users have the right to:
• Access, modify, or request deletion of their data.
• Object to use of their data for marketing.
• Withdraw consent to data processing at any time.
privacy_cookies_text:
Article 7 – Cookies:
Cookies may be used to enhance performance and personalize content. Users may disable them via browser settings.
privacy_modifications_text:
Article 8 – Amendments:
The Company reserves the right to update this policy at any time. Users will be notified of material changes via the app or email.
privacy_law_text:
Article 9 – Governing Law:
This policy is governed by Iraqi data protection laws. Najaf courts have exclusive jurisdiction over disputes.
terms_acceptance_text: By using or browsing the Wazzfni app, users agree to comply with these terms.
terms_eligibility_text: Users must have full legal capacity. Minors must use the app under guardian supervision.
terms_account_creation_text:
Users agree to:
- Provide accurate and truthful information.
- Avoid impersonation.
- Maintain only one account unless legally justified.
terms_allowed_usage_text:
Users are prohibited from:
- Uploading illegal, fraudulent, or harmful content.
- Attempting to breach security or disrupt the service.
- Using the app for unauthorized commercial purposes.
terms_ip_rights_text: All content, designs, logos, and technology are owned by the Company. Reproduction or reuse is prohibited without prior written consent.
terms_termination_text:
The Company may suspend or terminate accounts for:
- Violating terms or applicable laws.
- Misuse or service disruption.
- Causing harm to the Company or other users.
terms_modifications_text: The Company reserves the right to amend these terms without prior notice. The latest version published on the app or website shall apply.
terms_law_text: These terms are subject to the laws of Iraq. Najaf courts have exclusive jurisdiction over disputes.
